name: CreepX.co
description:
CreepX.co is an upcoming old-style arcade game for PC combining platforming, with a visual style inspired by 90s pixel art. As the most expert and senior courier, you must deliver package from monster world to their receiver, using Post service. Feel the old fast paced and challenging arcade gameplay.

Controls
WASD to move
Space to jump
E/LMB to shoot

Objective
-Collect package that will spawned at random location, and bring it back to the Post Service Portal(Place where player respawn).
-For every success delivery, you will get random weapons.
-There are 5 waves per level, the amounts of required package per waves are equal with the waves number. For example, for wave 1, you need to deliver 1 package to go the next wave. For wave 2, you need 2 package, and so on.
-You will get score when killing enemies, but the score will decreased when you die.
-If the score reaches 0, the game is over.

For now, this game is still in development. So this is just a demo.
